SELECT to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 7, 2), 'MM-DD') || '~' || to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 1, 2), 'MM-DD') week, T.TASK_ID, T.TASK_TITLE, SUM(W.MINUTES / 60) hours, 100 * ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(W.MINUTES / 60)) OVER(PARTITION BY to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 7, 2), 'MM-DD') || '~' || to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 1, 2), 'MM-DD') ), 4) rat FROM PMS_PROJ_WORK_LOG W, PMS_PROJ_TASK T WHERE TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE( #{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE( #{endDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND W.CREATOR = #{userId} AND W.TASK_ID = T.TASK_ID GROUP BY to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 7, 2), 'MM-DD') || '~' || to_char(next_day(TO_DATE(W.WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 15 / 24 - 1, 2), 'MM-DD'), T.TASK_TITLE, T.TASK_ID ORDER BY week,T.TASK_ID
